General.Name: Alhasoob Co
General.Description: Alhasoob Co. engages in the online retail of computers and its parts in Saudi Arabia. It offers bags, batteries, cameras, desktops, drums, HDD products, flash drives, gaming monitors and accessories, headphones, ink products, keyboards, laptops, micro SD cards, mouses, networking products, plotters, printers, projectors, RAM products, ribbons, scanners, servers, speakers, software products, SSD drives, tonners, and accessories. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Riyadh Al Nakhelah Building, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
